en: Some monsters are actually pretty shy. [pause]I think I can relate.
{player}, have you ever tried being a Traffikrab? [pause]Like [wave amp=30 freq=10]really being[/wave] a Traffikrab?
It's an experience.
Hey there! [pause]Record anything interesting today?
There have been more floods lately.
Sometimes[pause] I just like dashing through the forest!
I picked up a strange sticker the other day.[pause] It doesn't seem to do anything, but my opponent always looks [wave amp=30 freq=10]so annoyed[/wave]!
There's been another rogue sighting![pause][pause] We need all available rangers!
Invite {pawn} to hang out.
Challenge {pawn} to a friendly battle.
Good Bye!
Sure, I've got some free time!
I guess I can lend a hand, if you [wave amp=30 freq=10]really[/wave] need it.
We're not doing anything too dangerous[pause], are we?
It seems like you've got your hands full, maybe later!
I'm a bit anxious around this many people. Can we hang out some other time?
Lose the extra pair of hands first.
See you around!
Don't go too far, in case I need help…
Fine, I was in the middle of something anyway.
Sure, I could use the warm up!
Alright, but don't blame me for what happens next.
You'll go easy on me[pause], right?
That was more of a workout than I expected!
I was still getting warmed up.
{player}, you really don't pull your punches do you?
I'm still catching my breath from our last round! Maybe we can go again tomorrow?
Are you [wave amp=30 freq=10]trying[/wave] to humiliate me? Go pick on somebody else for a while.
I don't think I can keep up with you, {player}. I need some time to rethink my strategy!
